summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Forge Studio GPU monitoring app. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with minor AI Assistant panel issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Panel not opening when AI Assistant button is clicked - possible React state management issue
ui_bugs.details: Button exists and is clickable, but panel doesn't render. Backend chat API works perfectly.

design_issues.issue: RTL direction not properly applied to body element
design_issues.details: Arabic text renders correctly but body dir attribute not set to 'rtl'

passed_tests: All 14 backend API endpoints working (100% success)
GPU info display with RTX 5090 simulation
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Benchmarks, Inference, Settings)
Benchmark execution for all 4 types (CUDA, TensorRT, Vulkan, General)
Settings form inputs and save functionality
Arabic text rendering and UI localization
Backend-frontend integration for all main features
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix AI Assistant panel rendering issue - the button click handler may not be properly updating React state to show the chat panel. Backend chat API is working correctly.
